title: What is the most "satisfying" Ultimate in the game?
body:
Each of us has some personal favorites i guess :P

My absolute favorite is still after all this time the Garen Ultimate.

Killing someone with that thing is GLORIOUS
YOu want to screm DEMACIA in real life while you do it.

EDIT: Wow! didn't expect that many comments^^!! 
For now i belive th e most voted are {{champion:86}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:161}}

replies.body: {{champion:161}}
https://media.giphy.com/media/26tPbMSTINufOjk4g/giphy.gif

my opinions on {{champion:161}}  ult

https://49.media.tumblr.com/06a0499fed3a7dcff64273b94134e4e9/tumblr_ny4j4l0LrJ1rjxyrgo2_500.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Puddinglax,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ORZWaJt2,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2015-11-30T22:30:53.772+0000)
>
> {{champion:161}}

TFW you press R and know the enemy team will try to flee, but it's too late.
5-man sejuani ults feel glorious
{{champion:30}}  PENTAKILL {{champion:30}}

I love Sion ults.

"Cowards"
*retreats from a losing fight*
CHOO CHOO
{{champion:17}}  *heheh, ima ruin someones day*.

> [{quoted}](name=Macilento,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ORZWaJt2,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-11-30T21:25:45.430+0000)
> My absolute favorite is still after all this time the Garen Ultimate.

http://i.imgur.com/m9TXOO6.png
anyway

I love the fact that when ult with Garen, you can literally feel the sound it makes as you destroy their hopes and dreams...

https://45.media.tumblr.com/82f52147a01d3193ffe067b92373a391/tumblr_mm5f7cgDNs1sprrgro1_500.gif
{{champion:268}}s fuck off wall. does what its name says

{{champion:63}} 
Hey, you two, play pong for a couple seconds and see who wins.
5 man {{champion:267}}  ults in the jungle. NO WHERE TO RUN

{{champion:432}} 

What's not to love?

3 {{champion:238}} Diving in, doing the damage, then shadow out while waiting for the "pop" to kill the enemy. 

2{{champion:86}} DEMACIA!!!! Yes there is something to be said about a giant sword falling on them and your screen getting that sweet effect off a kill. Bonus points for when you see the Villain mark activate on them so you know it is going to kill them. 





1 {{champion:30}} What is better than a giant sword? How about 5 Death Lasers? Seeing everyone run around while it follows them gives me such a great feeling of power. Then when the beam finally hits and you here the double/triple/quanta/ or even penta kill brings a feeling that not even Garen ult can bring forth.

I personally agree with Kartheus ult, its just so terrifying knowing you can't stop it from hitting you, not to mention the effects that happen when it hits. Its literally like the whole rift shakes from the power of the blasts, not even Garen's ult causes the very rift to tremble.

My personal favorite is Viegar's ult, more specifically Final Boss Viegar aiming at an Ezreal. Nothing is more satisfying than seeing that crossdresser double flash away crapping his pants only to explode in a wonderful pixely explosion of death.
{{champion:24}}  WHOMP, WHOMP, WHOMP, WHOMP, if you know that sound.

{{summoner:4}} {{summoner:11}} {{summoner:11}} {{summoner:11}} {{summoner:7}} {{summoner:21}} {{summoner:32}} {{summoner:3}} 

Did I do it right?
{{champion:80}} ready for the mandrop
{{champion:254}}
When Nasus gets a kill with his Q instead of showing the +300 gold or whatever for the kill it should just show a big +6 instead because we all know that's the number that really matters.
{{champion:61}} Watching as the entire team is helplessly pulled into a small are only to be pummeled by a Malph and Maokai ult with a Yas flaying them for future sushi. They died, we won. The End
Ctrl+Alt+{{champion:90}}

I like cockblocking ults. A good ult that prevents people from dying creates delicious, salty enemy tears.

{{champion:40}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:16}} are so good at doing this.

> [{quoted}](name=Macilento,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ORZWaJt2,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-11-30T21:25:45.430+0000)
> Killing someone with that thing is GLORIOUS
> YOu want to screm DEMACIA in real life while you do it.

Aren't you supposed to though?
I liked Garen's ult a lot more shortly after his visual update when the screen ripple effect on kill was MUCH more pronounced. It seriously felt like it was going to shatter my monitor and it was EPIC.

Since they nerfed the hell out of the visuals on that though, my most satisfying ult is probably {{champion:21}} . There's something carnally pleasing about watching 5 enemy health bars disintegrate while THAT LAUGH goes off. *deep inhale* Intoxicating. >:)
{{champion:134}} DODGE BALL TIME!

I'd say Poppy's new one.
Haven't even played it yet.
But it is glorious.

My champ pool is limited, but I've got a few of my own:
{{champion:201}}: It's essentially a huge middle finger as you send a huge earth-shattering crack through the ground, sending the whole enemy team running.
{{champion:14}}: Nothing feels better than being an unstoppable onslaught, running at the enemy horde, nothing that they can do about it, except maybe sidestep.
{{champion:75}}: Super saiyan baby, go god mode and destroy people as they see you with the press of a button change the tides of battle and the kill potential increase exponentially.
{{champion:111}}: CanNAUT believe that no one's mentioned this guy's ult. Such a good feeling when you mark an enemy for death, and as they foolishly run away, seeking so-called safety behind their tanks only to be knocked aside by the charge and finally get the marked's depth charge to the grey screen
{{champion:222}}  come on, who doesn't love a good snipe?

{{champion:101}} 

Just kidding its {{champion:45}}
{{champion:51}} 's only when i get a kill

5-man Equalizers, perfectly timed Chronobreak, completed Grand Challenge, just to name a few.

Nothing will beat Tempered Fate on your whole allied team tho.
Fully-channeled AP Galio ult. Probably has something to do with the sound effect at the end of the channel. Oh, and also the huge damage.
{{champion:150}} Getting a 5 man stun is quite satisfying.

Mechanically, {{champion:101}}'s. Feels so nice landing all three shots.

Visually: {{champion:3}}
Galio
Nothing better then calling forth a phalanx wall as {{champion:268}}  to block the charging {{champion:14}}
I picked Top Anivia to counter Sion once. Every single Ult, I was there to stop him with W. It was glorious. No need to save ults for it :3

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ORZWaJt2,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2015-11-30T21:54:46.978+0000)
>
> I picked Top Anivia to counter Sion once. Every single Ult, I was there to stop him with W. It was glorious. No need to save ults for it :3

rofl poor sion

5th place: Bard. Just the sound on impact is delicious.

4th place: Karthus. None can outrun death

3rd place: Twitch. There are few more satisfying things than annihilating the backline in 3 shots from a Twitch ult.

2nd place: Darius. I think I'm addicted to dunking plz help.

1st place: Veigar. BOOOOOOOOM

I'd have to go with my 2 favorites:

Gnar for that 5 man wall stun engage. 

And Sion for when u hit someone at full speed, screaming "COOOWAAAAAARRRDDSS" with 5k hp and + and then blow the shield up and smash people around.
{{champion:14}}

Full AP {{champion:20}} 

Confirmed nuclear detonation in the tri-brush
{{champion:150}}
I think maybe Lissandra's Frozen Tomb. {{champion:127}}
